meanings.definition: A palm tree with fan-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The palmettoes swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love the sight of palmettoes lining the beach.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the palmettoes as a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The palmettoes stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green palmettoes added a tropical touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The leaves of a palmetto tree.
meanings.sent1: The hiker admired the lush palmettoes along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The palmettoes rustled in the wind, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the fallen palmettoes in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The palmettoes shimmered in the sunlight like emerald jewels.
meanings.sent5: The sharp edges of the palmettoes made them difficult to handle.

meanings.sent1: The dense palmettoes provided shade from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The palmettoes in the swamp formed a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorer ventured into the heart of the palmettoes.
meanings.sent4: The palmettoes clustered together like a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: The rustling of the palmettoes created a soothing symphony in the forest.
